title: Roku OS 11 takes on Apple TV with Photo Streams, voice-enabled keyboard, more
content:
Apple TV competitor, Roku announced today a new operating system update, version 11. This software is set to bring voice-enabled keyboards to a few languages and supported regions, Roku Photo Streams feature, and more.

moreâ€¦

The post Roku OS 11 takes on Apple TV with Photo Streams, voice-enabled keyboard, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple TV competitor, Roku is announcing a new operating system update with version 11 bringing voice-enabled keyboards, Roku Photo Streams feature, more.
